cast.name: 莉莉丝·斯坦根博格 Lilith Stangenberg
安纳托·陶布曼 Anatole Taubman
佐格赛坎·纳兰索格特 Tsogtsaikan Narantsogt
安德烈亚斯·马蒂 Andreas Matti
安德拉什·苏特 András Sütö
罗纳尔德·策尔费尔德 Ronald Zehrfeld
朱莉娅·雅库博斯卡 Julia Jakubowska
乔瑟夫‧欧斯顿多夫 Josef Ostendorf

introduction: Adaptation of Jeremias Gotthelf's world-famous novella with Lilith Stangenberg, Nurit Hirschfeld, Anatole Taubman and Marcus Signer. Sumiswald in the Emmental in the 13th century. The courageous, young midwife Christine makes a pact with the devil in order to free her village from the brutal terror of the Teutonic Knights. When Satan demands his agreed wage and doesn't get it, he punishes the village with a spider plague. Christine becomes the scapegoat and thus the hunted. Only her sister Maria understands the suffering she endures to defy Satan's command. Christine faces the decisive battle against the diabolical power that wants to take away the greatest good she is willing to die for: humanity.
